Reviews.Title: “Good spot to stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed family wife 2 children overnight staff bob anne accommodating bedroom apartment position apartments corner chinatown 5 min walk darling harbour precinct walk nearest monorail station supermarket 100m free city loop bus cinemas eateries galore doorstep waldorf preferred stay im staying overnight sydney compared ive stayed price reasonable convenient

Reviews.Title: “Poor personal service”
Reviews.Author: Gary T
Reviews.Content: rang told booking 1pm arriving 1130am office unattended rang 1145am told staff attending brother laws funeral changed 1pm told cleaners couldnt keys public toilets changed 120pm disgusting

Reviews.Title: “Great location”

Reviews.Content: value money partner stayed nights parents ideal family vacation apartments little tired updating spacious offer living balcony kitchen enabled save breakfasts meals coles supermarket road purchase bread cereal milk etc waldorf provide tea coffee kitchen arrived check time travelled day staff quickly enable check apartment found staff times helpful accommodating stayed floor little noise street below apartments short walk darling habour china town city center

Reviews.Content: arriving dark liverpool street hour half hotel entrance poorly lit times 5day stay automatic front door car park gates failed swipe card adequate reasonably priced central location
